The Given is IP,Mask

[ip: 192.168.204.197]
[mask[:26]

convert the Ip to binary:
{1100 0000.1010 1000.1100.1100.11000 0101}

mask repeat number one 26 times and zero 6 times:
{1111 1111.1111 1111.1111 1111.1100 0000}

 mask to ip mask {255.255.255.192}

subnet:192

min is +1 = 193
{1100 0000.1010 1000.1100 1100.1100 0101}
{1111 1111.1111 1111.1111 1111.1100 0000}

broadcast is 255

to get max just minus 1 so it is 254.

binary = 1100 0000.1010 1000.1100 1100.1100 0101
mask = 1111 1111.1111 1111.1111 1111.1100 0000
